unnormalised: Hey, rooftop solar subsidies sound good! My cousin, Priya in Chennai, was saying the initial costs are killer. Hope the subsidies are decent, like enough to cover a good chunk of a 2kW system. Heard MNRE is pushing this. Wonder if they'll announce anything new during Diwali? Imagine free electricity to watch all the light shows! Saving money for biryani is always a win. Even a small subsidy, say Rs. 20,000, would help. My uncle Ramu in Kerala says they are great.
normalised: Hey, rooftop solar subsidies sound good! My cousin, Priya in Chennai, was saying the initial costs are killer. Hope the subsidies are decent, like enough to cover a good chunk of a two kilowatt system. Heard M N R E is pushing this. Wonder if they'll announce anything new during Diwali? Imagine free electricity to watch all the light shows! Saving money for biryani is always a win. Even a small subsidy, say rupees twenty thousand, would help. My uncle Ramu in Kerala says they are great.
